about_the_game:
The Awen Forest is dying. With every corner losing its light and vitality, the last guardian, Fae, must embark on an ancient journey, facing not only challenges and puzzles but also the traces left by the guardians who once protected this sacred place.

The Last Awen tells the story of Fae, a solitary protector destined to restore balance to the forest. With an ethereal and mystical art direction, this side-scrolling platform and puzzle game is an ode to nature, protection, and sacrifice, as Fae rekindles the spiritual connection of the ancient guardians in their final and most important mission.
